title: Android 13 Beta 2 hands-on: Top new features [Video]
content:
Android 13 Beta 2 is now available right off the back of an impressive I/O 2022 developer conference. Here are a few of the top new features in the second public-facing beta for the next Android release.

description: We've ranked all of the best new features that have been added to Google Pixel devices as part of the public-facing Android 13 Beta 2.
